channel.title: Old release - Chosen Angels Version 1!
channel.description:
Hey guys haven't been able to acces mopar forums, because i cannot connect on my computer, so here it is. i've been told someone leeched me and posted it on here, i am the real owner and coder or whatever..
i really do not like this, but i'll be releasing v2 when i come back peace.
[size=4][b]Chosen angels source and client v1[/b][/size]
First of all i have an announcement!
[ALERT] V2 RELEASE DATE around.. December 26th through early december. [ALERT]
SOOO MANY NEW FEATURES, PLACES, AND 40 PERCENT OF PEST CONTROL SO FAR, WELL IT WOULD BE 90% BUT I KEEP GETTING AN ERROR --- !!!
so far done to pc
-Banks fully working - bank and open quickly -command ::pest teles you to pest control bank -Gangplank fully working teleing u into the boat -Ladder would be working NEED THE OBJ ID -Timer working to tele u into game - Portals added, and also Void npcs - Spinners, torchers, etc.
All i need is to make the portals work and rewards..
Also i added working head icons, and also npc drops at train. gunna del some shops, to take care of it so theres no nulls on teh next client!
Also!
-Added, and removed commands (removed useless ones) -A gameison.java
Client
New jframe, background, and also new titlemenu like rs - Login, username and pass
its sick u'll love it..
[COLOR="SeaGreen"][B]Hey guys, if you check my souce out, please leave a comment, If you like, love, don't like etc.. And also a suggestion to make it better.. Thankyou .. Braiton (chosen angel) [/B][/COLOR]
I don't have accounts on any other forums so thats all if you see anywheres else, please tell me. and report it. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [size=3]I put the source and the client folder in one .rar file to compact it and make the file a lesser size[/size]
~---First the downloads---~
~Uppit~
[url=http://"http://uppit.com/ZKONSY"]http://uppit.com/ZKONSY[/url] [url=http://"http://uppit.com/ZKONSY"]http://uppit.com/ZKONSY[/url]
If uppit didn't work for ya---
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gjmokoi2mmj]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gjmokoi2mmj[/url]
Okay
--Reasons to download--
-Custom places -custom veng thanks to rockhard -New auto restarter i found made by abraham2119 it minimizes next to your time so it doesn't take up space, with a restart, start, and stop button -modified sprites -added models -much more =) -just look at pics nuff said. :)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Commands off the top of my head ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [u]add the :: infront of them[/u]
Normal players
[code] dragon dweps home train gs 3rdage shops cwars (or cw) forgot =\ runes arrows skills edge vwild pkbox much much more but i have forgotten check ::commands or my source files for the rest;)[/code]
Moderater Commands [code] All of the normal player commands Also pickup ban kick staffzone xteleto also check ::commands ingame or source files for the rest if i have left out any.[/code]
Admin Commands [code]pickup ban kick ipban staffzone xteletome many more check ::commands and your source files[/code] [b]Owner commands[/b] [code]all of the other ones you see above
and also - givemod giveadmin giveowner hide show and more check source files and ::commands![/code]
[size=4]------------------------------------------Pictures!----------------------------------------[/size]
First off client background
[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/3070/technition222529qt5.png[/img]
Client shop at barrows you should move it to client shops through the portal at shops! (just an idea) =) also when you tele to client shops you get some client items (arrows armor) [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/3365/technition225150yy6.png[/img] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- CREDITS TO ROCKHARD!!! on the godly protectors --- i just added them into models =)
[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/5589/technition230504km1.png[/img]
If you are using Rockhardscape's client then this is what veng looks like!
[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/509/technition231437ht5.png[/img]
You can download his client --- at [url=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?4tbgxas2qty"]http://www.mediafire.com/?4tbgxas2qty[/url] ---- 100% to him not taking any credit for this i just love the models =) ----Great job on this one rockhard----
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------Okay now for the Source Pictures!!!------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Home!
[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/3597/technition223914ub8.png[/img]
All skill cape emotes!!!!! [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/55/computertechnition16515ul7.png[/img]
Portal to Portals!!! [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/1553/technition223958op7.png[/img]
Fully working w\ emotes ancients and freezing! [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/4774/computertechnition00041aw8.png[/img]
Client shops/ Castlewars portal! at shops! [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8632/technition224217qc7.png[/img]
Shops pic 2 [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/1908/technition224322sh1.png[/img]
Normally 30 - 70 ppl on proof? I guess my server must be pretty good? =) [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/3879/computertechnition20384jb9.png[/img]
ground pic of some of the items [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/1949/computertechnition17154aq6.png[/img]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ------------------------------------------------------Pking places!--------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/1481/technition224432ys5.png[/img]
[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/3774/technition224807jq2.png[/img]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------~Theres not an edge picture because i think we all know what it looks like :) The edge tele is on the emotes tablet ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Vengeance Pictures and stages! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/9128/technition224505bu3.png[/img] Custom pkbox venging [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/4382/technition224615xk1.png[/img]
Skillz!
[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/9315/computertechnition17141gg3.png[/img]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Custom Barrows Minigame! 100% ownage! credits to me for all custom places, and some to tutorials to make barrows! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Stage one : Dharoks [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8210/technition225307ze5.png[/img]
Stage two : Veracs
[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/6813/technition225334cr3.png[/img]
Stage three: Guthans [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/9306/technition225509ek7.png[/img]
Stage Four: Torags [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8153/technition225534jc6.png[/img]
Stage Five: Ahrims [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/7528/technition225557ng1.png[/img]
Stage six: Karils [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/7425/technition225621ml7.png[/img]
How to get Prize [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/2245/technition225657jf0.png[/img]
Prize [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/589/technition225745hk4.png[/img]
::jail (username) command [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/4884/technition225925ur1.png[/img]
::unjail (username) [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/549/technition230052ea6.png[/img]
gsminigame [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/6171/technition231533ab0.png[/img]
::3rdage [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/9471/technition223356yc7.png[/img]
::jad [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/3697/technition230600gp1.png[/img]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------!Custom Train!------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8328/technition231708ls5.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/9025/technition231759gb5.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/9916/technition231829ot1.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/1331/technition231850cz3.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/2002/technition231921bf4.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/3637/technition231955bt5.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/6388/technition232014qo0.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/6448/technition232052uv6.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/1550/technition232119ui2.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/6310/technition232253wp2.png[/img]
Thats all =) Also it shows your password in the quest tab ---- Credits to figment =)
Credits to All of you have made tutorials. - The Reaper For skills - Teh Ice Realm Client Base - Project Czar maker ... we all owe it all to him and dodian (dodian and project czar started it all) my opinion.
I have coded this source for about 1 or 2 months those are the only times i have coded..
I had a source before this.. but not a working compiler until i made this and found a good compiler =)
[b]This also comes with a new auto restarter made by abraham2119 that minimizes down next to you time =) even when its on thanks abraham for that =)[/b]
Post good/ bad feedback w\e you'd like
Thanks for everything guys,
~Braiton~

item.title: Old release - Chosen Angels Version 1!
item.dc:creator: @Braiton Braiton
item.description:
@Braiton wrote:

Yeah my v1 sucked, all you people who accuse of leeching are idiots… i am braiton of the silabsoft forums, i’m a moderator there… so pm me if you do not believe me… if you think project deforced made this then… well… your an idiot…

The source says made by braiton does it not? I’m braiton on silabsoft, rune-server, and i’m chosenAngel on runelocus… pm me anywhere…

To the person that says wow look at your rank… wow… i only have 6 posts here… mopar hasn’t done much for me in the past… well i was ipbanned from 3 years ago when i was a rsps player… but now i can actually manipulate code better than most of you…

pm me on silabsoft if you do not believe me.

Read full topic

item.title: Old release - Chosen Angels Version 1!
item.dc:creator: @Braiton Braiton
item.description:
@Braiton wrote:

Hey guys haven’t been able to acces mopar forums, because i cannot connect on my computer, so here it is.
i’ve been told someone leeched me and posted it on here, i am the real owner and coder or whatever…

i really do not like this, but i’ll be releasing v2 when i come back peace.

[size=4]Chosen angels source and client v1[/size]

First of all i have an announcement!

[ALERT] V2 RELEASE DATE around… December 26th through early december. [ALERT]

SOOO MANY NEW FEATURES, PLACES, AND 40 PERCENT OF PEST CONTROL SO FAR, WELL IT WOULD BE 90% BUT I KEEP GETTING AN ERROR — !!!

so far done to pc

-Banks fully working - bank and open quickly
-command ::pest teles you to pest control bank
-Gangplank fully working teleing u into the boat
-Ladder would be working NEED THE OBJ ID
-Timer working to tele u into game

  • Portals added, and also Void npcs - Spinners, torchers, etc.

All i need is to make the portals work and rewards…

Also i added working head icons, and also npc drops at train. gunna del some shops, to take care of it so theres no nulls on teh next client!

Also!

-Added, and removed commands (removed useless ones)
-A gameison.java

Client

New jframe, background, and also new titlemenu like rs - Login, username and pass

its sick u’ll love it…

[COLOR=“SeaGreen”]Hey guys, if you check my souce out, please leave a comment, If you like, love, don’t like etc… And also a suggestion to make it better… Thankyou … Braiton (chosen angel) [/COLOR]

I don’t have accounts on any other forums so thats all if you see anywheres else, please tell me. and report it.

[size=3]I put the source and the client folder in one .rar file to compact it and make the file a lesser size[/size]

~—First the downloads—~

~Uppit~

http://uppit.com/ZKONSY
http://uppit.com/ZKONSY

If uppit didn’t work for ya—

http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gjmokoi2mmj

Okay

–Reasons to download–

-Custom places
-custom veng thanks to rockhard
-New auto restarter i found made by abraham2119 it minimizes next to your time so it doesn’t take up space, with a restart, start, and stop button
-modified sprites
-added models
-much more =)
-just look at pics nuff said.

Commands off the top of my head

add the :: infront of them

Normal players

dragon dweps home train gs 3rdage shops cwars (or cw) forgot =\ runes arrows skills edge vwild pkbox much much more but i have forgotten check ::commands or my source files for the rest;)

Moderater Commands

All of the normal player commands Also pickup ban kick staffzone xteleto also check ::commands ingame or source files for the rest if i have left out any.

Admin Commands

pickup ban kick ipban staffzone xteletome many more check ::commands and your source files
Owner commands

[code]all of the other ones you see above

and also

givemod
giveadmin
giveowner
hide
show
and more check source files and ::commands![/code]

[size=4]------------------------------------------Pictures!----------------------------------------[/size]

First off client background

Client shop at barrows you should move it to client shops through the portal at shops! (just an idea) =) also when you tele to client shops you get some client items (arrows armor)

CREDITS TO ROCKHARD!!! on the godly protectors — i just added them into models =)

If you are using Rockhardscape’s client then this is what veng looks like!

You can download his client — at http://www.mediafire.com/?4tbgxas2qty ---- 100% to him not taking any credit for this i just love the models =) ----Great job on this one rockhard----

-----------------------------------------Okay now for the Source Pictures!!!-------------------------------------------------

Home!

All skill cape emotes!!!

Portal to Portals!!!

Fully working w\ emotes ancients and freezing!

Client shops/ Castlewars portal! at shops!

Shops pic 2

Normally 30 - 70 ppl on proof? I guess my server must be pretty good? =)

ground pic of some of the items

------------------------------------------------------Pking places!---------------------------------------------------------------

-------~Theres not an edge picture because i think we all know what it looks like The edge tele is on the emotes tablet

Vengeance Pictures and stages!


Custom pkbox venging

Skillz!

Custom Barrows Minigame! 100% ownage! credits to me for all custom places, and some to tutorials to make barrows!

Stage one : Dharoks

Stage two : Veracs

Stage three: Guthans

Stage Four: Torags

Stage Five: Ahrims

Stage six: Karils

How to get Prize

Prize

::jail (username) command

::unjail (username)

gsminigame

::3rdage

::jad

-----------------------------------------------------------------!Custom Train!-------------------------------------------------------------------










Thats all =)
Also it shows your password in the quest tab ---- Credits to figment =)

Credits to All of you have made tutorials.

  • The Reaper For skills
  • Teh Ice Realm Client Base
  • Project Czar maker … we all owe it all to him and dodian (dodian and project czar started it all) my opinion.

I have coded this source for about 1 or 2 months those are the only times i have coded…

I had a source before this… but not a working compiler until i made this and found a good compiler =)

This also comes with a new auto restarter made by abraham2119 that minimizes down next to you time =) even when its on thanks abraham for that =)

Post good/ bad feedback w\e you’d like

Thanks for everything guys,

                                    ~Braiton~
